{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Helix Fossil |image = [[File:Helix_Fossil.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Helix Fossil''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Helix Fossil''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil]]. ==Details== When a Helix Fossil is placed in the [[Pokémon Day Care]], it hatches into an Omanyte. ==Mine Layout== The Helix Fossil appears in the Underground as a 4x4 sized object.

[[File:HelixFossilMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align: center;" |- ! Fossil !! Pokémon |- | [[File:Helix_Fossil.png|30px]] || [[File:Omanyte.png|40px]] Omanyte |} ==Acquisition== Helix Fossils can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]]. There is also a 50% chance of receiving one after beating [[Mt. Moon]] for the first time.
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]] __NOTOC__
